meanings.definition: A group of primitive vascular plants that lack true leaves and roots.
meanings.sent1: Psilophytes are ancient plants without proper leaves or roots.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study psilophytes to learn about early plant evolution.
meanings.sent3: The psilophytes in the garden were jealous of the other plants' fancy leaves.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the psilophytes stood tall like ancient guardians of nature.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit showcased the fascinating world of psilophytes.

meanings.definition: Plants belonging to the division Psilophyta, characterized by simple, dichotomously branching stems.
meanings.sent1: The psilophytes in the forest had unique branching stems.
meanings.sent2: Psilophytes are known for their distinctively branching structures.
meanings.sent3: The psilophytes at the botanical garden were always arguing about which stem was better.
meanings.sent4: As the wind blew, the psilophytes danced gracefully with their branching stems swaying.
meanings.sent5: Children marveled at the strange beauty of the psilophytes in the science exhibit.
